title: Poisoned Russian spy's daughter 'rapidly improving'
text:
Poisoned Russian spy's daughter 'rapidly improving' Thursday, March 29, 2018 - 01:14 
Yulia Skripal, who was poisoned along with ex-spy father Sergei Skripal, is no longer in critical condition and is 'improving rapidly', according to doctors treating her.   
Yulia Skripal, who was poisoned along with ex-spy father Sergei Skripal, is no longer in critical condition and is 'improving rapidly', according to doctors treating her.  //reut.rs/2J0fCzg
